input: Construct a batch request to fetch both completed and proposed account holder change requests.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusCode eq '3' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /ProposedBankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequest HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
